text:
Mario das Neves (April 27, 1951 – October 31, 2017) was an Argentine Justicialist Party politician. He was the governor of the Argentine province of Chubut from 2003 through 2011 and again from 2015 until his death in 2017. He was born in Buenos Aires.
Das Neves died of cardiopulmonary arrest on October 31, 2017 in Rawson, Chubut at the age of 66.
